Message Handler¶

class message_handler.MessageHandler[source]¶

Singleton that handles when a message is received either through bluetooth or sockets.

handle_dt_feedback(message)[source]¶

decodes the message to one or more TeamDTFeedback

Args:
message (str): the received message
handle_match(message)[source]¶

decodes the message to one or more TeamMatchData

Args:
message (str): the received message
handle_message(message)[source]¶

decodes the message

Args:
message (str): the received message
handle_pit(message)[source]¶

decodes the message to one or more TeamPitData

Args:
message (str): the received message
handle_super(message)[source]¶

decodes the message to one or more SuperMatchData

Args:
message (str): the received message
handle_sync()[source]¶

creates a response for a sync request
